oakhaven_village.name: Oakhaven
oakhaven_village.description: A small farming and lumber village nestled at the edge of the Whispering Woods
oakhaven_village.economy: Agriculture, lumber, trade with nearby settlements
oakhaven_village.recent_troubles: Goblin raids on supply wagons, missing livestock, strange sounds from the woods at night

whispering_woods.name: Whispering Woods
whispering_woods.description: An old-growth forest with trees that seem to whisper secrets in the wind
whispering_woods.reputation: Locals avoid it after sundown, said to be magical and dangerous
whispering_woods.inhabitants: Various woodland creatures, rumored spirits, and recent goblin presence
features: Ancient oak trees with faces in the bark
Clearings where the light seems different
Paths that sometimes lead to unexpected places
The old shrine to forgotten nature gods
whispering_woods.magic: Nature magic is stronger here, divination spells work unpredictably

old_man_willow.name: Old Man Willow
old_man_willow.appearance: Ancient man with bark-like skin, clothes of leaves and moss, carries a gnarled staff
old_man_willow.personality: Gruff but fair, protective of the forest, speaks in riddles and nature metaphors
old_man_willow.motivations: Preserve the natural balance, protect the forest from corruption
old_man_willow.knowledge: Knows the history of the woods, can sense disturbances in nature
old_man_willow.attitude_to_party: Initially suspicious, but may become helpful if shown respect for nature

goblin_tribe.name: Snagtooth Tribe
goblin_tribe.territory: Cave system near Oakhaven, parts of the Whispering Woods
goblin_tribe.leadership: Grak the Goblin Boss and his lieutenants
goblin_tribe.recent_behavior: More organized than usual, targeting specific supplies rather than random raids
goblin_tribe.motivation: Being driven by something deeper in the woods, seeking magical artifacts
goblin_tribe.connection: May be influenced by the 'foul disturbance' mentioned by Old Man Willow

ancient_shrine.name: Shrine of the Green Mother
ancient_shrine.location: Deep in the Whispering Woods, hidden by overgrowth
ancient_shrine.description: Stone altar carved with nature symbols, surrounded by standing stones
ancient_shrine.history: Once used by druids to communicate with nature spirits
ancient_shrine.current_state: Corrupted by dark magic, source of the disturbance affecting the forest
ancient_shrine.danger: Dark energy emanates from here, corrupting nearby creatures and plants
